description:
Things get awkward around Mimimi. Tomozaki finally chooses the two girls he`d like to pursue, and Hinami gives him more tasks in pursuit of his goals.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: If You Don`t Make Up Your Mind, the Story Won`t Advance
Sentakushi no Mae de Mayoi Tsuzukete mo Monogatari wa Susumanai
選択肢の前で迷い続けても物語は進まない
